title: Godot Engine Official
description: Godot is a 2D and 3D free and open source game engine developed by a community of contributors. It provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.

items.title: Godot Rendering Priorities: September 2024
items.description: 4.3 is out. It's time for an update!
items.dc:creator: Clay John

items.title: Godot Editor on the Meta Horizon Store
items.description: Introducing the Godot Editor for Meta Quest (Horizon OS) devices
items.dc:creator: Fredia Huya-Kouadio

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 dev 2
items.description: The PR harvest keeps going strongly for Godot 4.4, with massive new features such as typed dictionaries and error-less project import!
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Godot 3.6 finally released!
items.description: After 2 years of development, Godot 3.6 is finally out and it comes fully packed with features and quality of life improvements! This includes 2D physics interpolation and hierarchical culling, and 3D mesh merging, level of detail, tighter shadow culling, ORM materials, and more.
items.dc:creator: lawnjelly

items.title: Submissions open for Godot 2024 showreel!
items.description: Showcase your Godot creations in 2024! We're inviting submissions of short videos featuring your published or in-progress Godot games or tools. Don't miss this chance to be a part of it!
items.dc:creator: Emi

items.title: About Official Console Ports
items.description: With this post we aim to address the community’s questions about the lack of official console ports through the Godot Foundation.
items.dc:creator: Emi

items.title: Meeting the community at gamescom 2024
items.description: Back from gamescom, ready to report.
items.dc:creator: Nat

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 dev 1
items.description: The first snapshot after releasing 4.3, already packed with new features!
items.dc:creator: Clay John

items.title: Godot 4.3, a shared effort
items.description: With over 3,500 commits authored by over 500 contributors, the latest Godot Engine release comes packed full of new features and improvements.
items.dc:creator: Godot contributors

items.title: Design of the Skeleton Modifier 3D
items.description: We have reworked the skeleton bone update process to add SkeletonModifier3D for modifying the Skeleton.
items.dc:creator: Silc Renew

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.3 RC 3
items.description: With all known major regressions fixed, we are now publishing a third release candidate to confirm that 4.3 is ready to go stable.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Gamescom here we come!
items.description: We are once again attending gamescom, and organizing two meet-up opportunities this time.
items.dc:creator: Nat

items.title: Introducing the improved ufbx importer in Godot 4.3
items.description: Godot 4.3 now includes native .fbx support
items.dc:creator: Lyuma

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.3 RC 2
items.description: After a week in the Release Candidate stage, we have squashed most bugs we were still tracking for 4.3, and are ready for a second candidate.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.3 RC 1
items.description: We are cautiously optimistic that Godot 4.3 is ready for release, please test it and let us know if we are right!
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.3 beta 3
items.description: We are nearing the end of the beta phase for Godot 4.3, which is shaping up to be a very solid release, solving a lot of pain points.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: New Dev Fund Perks: Discord Role and Forum Badge
items.description: Proudly display your support on our community platforms.
items.dc:creator: Winston Yallow

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 3.6 RC 1
items.description: We are now at the Release Candidate stage, finalizing everything so that we can release 3.6-stable for all users.
items.dc:creator: lawnjelly

items.title: Godot Community Poll 2024
items.description: We want to learn more about the Godot community, understand who the users of the engine are, and find out how we can better support you.
items.dc:creator: Emi

items.title: Godot returns: gamescom latam
items.description: Godot will be present at gamescom latam once again: meet contributors and fellow gamedevs at the booth, or sign up to our very own party!
items.dc:creator: George Marques

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.3 beta 2
items.description: Godot 4.3 is in beta, and progressing well towards stable. This beta 2 fixes many critical issues reported by testers of the previous snapshots.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: GodotCon 24 - Submit ideas! Get tickets!
items.description: GodotCon 24 will take place on the 12+13th of October in Berlin, Germany. The first batch of tickets as well as the call for speakers and exhibitors just went live. Sponsors welcome.
items.dc:creator: Nat

items.title: Migrating Animations from Godot 4.0 to 4.3
items.description: In Godot 4.3, a large number of animation features have been reworked since 4.0, so it's time to migrate your animations.
items.dc:creator: Silc Renew

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.3 beta 1
items.description: Godot 4.3 is ready for broad testing as we finalize the release.
items.dc:creator: Godot contributors
